title: Unified IoT Health Score
description: A single, easy-to-read score that shows device connectivity, latency, and health across your entire fleet.

title: AI-driven Recommendations
description: Actionable, prioritized remediation steps and alerts powered by machine learning.

title: Role-based Dashboards
description: Tailored dashboards for operators, managers, and executives with deep drilldowns.

title: Seamless Integrations
description: Prebuilt connectors and APIs to plug into your observability and IT tooling stack.
